1.title: Part 1
1.plot: The McGuigan's and team Cyclone focus all their efforts on the run up to the most important fight in Carl Frampton's career, his first fight against Leo Santa Cruz, taking place in Las Vegas.

2.title: Part 2
2.plot: After Frampton's huge win, Conrad Cummings looks to further his career in the ring on the Groves vs Gutknecht undercard. Barry goes back to Ireland and opens up about his family and deceased brother. Shane and Sophie tie the knot in Spain.

3.title: Part 3
3.plot: Tensions run high as Team Cyclone gear up for Carl's title defense, in the rematch bout with Santa Cruz. Barry and Carl discuss growing up in a divided Northern Ireland.

imdb.plot outline: Filmed between June 2016 and February 2017, Fight Game: The McGuigans follows the family and the fortunes of Barry McGuigan's family, star fighter Carl Frampton and other boxers in the Cyclone promotions stable. Over the course of three episodes, unprecedented access to the McGuigan and Frampton families provides a fly-on-the-wall insight into the world of boxing and the hard work, skill and determination - not to mention family support - that goes into making a world champion. The series also provides a candid, glimpse into McGuigan family life and features frank and revealing interviews with Barry, Carl, boxing trainer Shane and other family members. While the series highlights the excitement and thrill of winning, it also shows the other side of boxing - the danger. Fight Game: The McGuigans is not just a series about boxing; it is also a series about relationships and the blood, sweat and tears at the core of both.
imdb.title: Fight Game: The McGuigans
plot: Filmed between June 2016 and February 2017, _Fight Game: The McGuigans_ (qv) follows the family and the fortunes of Barry McGuigan's family, star fighter Carl Frampton and other boxers in the Cyclone promotions stable. Over the course of three episodes, unprecedented access to the McGuigan and Frampton families provides a fly-on-the-wall insight into the world of boxing and the hard work, skill and determination - not to mention family support - that goes into making a world champion. The series also provides a candid, glimpse into McGuigan family life and features frank and revealing interviews with Barry, Carl, boxing trainer Shane and other family members. While the series highlights the excitement and thrill of winning, it also shows the other side of boxing - the danger. _Fight Game: The McGuigans_ (qv) is not just a series about boxing; it is also a series about relationships and the blood, sweat and tears at the core of both.
